name: shareboard
description: ShareBoard - an open source interactive whiteboard & collaboration app
author: ShareBoard Team

scripts.start: concurrently -n Backend,Frontend -c bgGreen,bgBlue "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: npm run clean && concurrently -n Backend,Frontend -c bgGreen,bgBlue "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.test: concurrently -n Backend,Frontend -c bgGreen,bgBlue "cd backend && npm run test" "cd frontend && npm run test"
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm -s run lint && cd ../frontend && npm -s run lint && cd .. && npm -s run lint-shared
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint-shared: echo Linting shared... && tslint -c tslint.json -p shared/tsconfig.json -t stylish
